name: Illusion Curved Corner Sofa In Woven Jacquard Fabric w Special Marble Effect

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: This sofa distinguishes itself with its curved silhouette and organic back design, creating the illusion of seamlessly fitting into a 90-degree corner and making any room feel cozy. Its timeless design, featuring a contemporary silhouette with soft lines and balanced proportions, exudes sophistication and charm. Upholstered in high-quality fabrics or leathers, the sofa offers a variety of textures and colors to match different decor preferences, with COM available upon request. Customers can personalize the sofa by choosing from a wide selection of upholstery options, including different fabrics, leathers, and wood colors, ensuring it fits specific aesthetic and functional needs. Solid wood frame, upholstery cushions filled with high-density foam ensure comfort, while meticulous craftsmanship and handcrafted details guarantee durability and superior quality. This combination of comfort, style, and quality makes the sofa a standout piece for any interior style, providing both support and softness for an exceptional seating experience. We will be glad to check with the factory’s technical team if sizes, finishes, and colors can be customized. We do our best to expedite production and to ship and deliver product within the listed lead time, however current lead times might be longer due to global shipping backlog and delays. These delays are out of our control and cannot be a reason to cancel an order.
